docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs . yml # The configuration file . docs / index . md # The documentation homepage . ... # Other markdown pages , images and other files .
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Acesso cluster unisinos Para acessar a interface gráfica do miniPC Fazer um túnel para o front-end do cluster: ssh -p 8282 soft5g@ppgca.unisinos.br -L 3390 :10.0.200.10:3389 Usar um cliente RDP (Remmina, Cord, etc.) e configurar Server: localhost:3390 Para configurar o serviço Web do free5GC (no miniPC) via browser: localhost:3000 via browser: localhost:7100 user: qualquer coisa pass: qualquercoisa@qualquer.coisa Precisa estar rodando o script start_stf.sh Túnel ssh user @ppgca.unisinos.br -L porta_local : nome_nodo : porta_webservice user : usuário para acessar o front-end do cluster (não o mini_pc) porta_local : porta do teu PC que tu queres redirecionar para o túnel nome_nodo : nome ou endereço IP que demos para o mini PC porta_webservice : é a porta que está executando o Web Service no mini PC
docs.title: Cluster Access

docs.text: Fazer um túnel para o front-end do cluster: ssh -p 8282 soft5g@ppgca.unisinos.br -L 3390 :10.0.200.10:3389 Usar um cliente RDP (Remmina, Cord, etc.) e configurar Server: localhost:3390
docs.title: Para acessar a interface gráfica do miniPC

docs.text: via browser: localhost:3000 via browser: localhost:7100 user: qualquer coisa pass: qualquercoisa@qualquer.coisa Precisa estar rodando o script start_stf.sh
docs.title: Para configurar o serviço Web do free5GC (no miniPC)

docs.text: ssh user @ppgca.unisinos.br -L porta_local : nome_nodo : porta_webservice user : usuário para acessar o front-end do cluster (não o mini_pc) porta_local : porta do teu PC que tu queres redirecionar para o túnel nome_nodo : nome ou endereço IP que demos para o mini PC porta_webservice : é a porta que está executando o Web Service no mini PC

docs.text: Minikube Setup In order to setup minikube in our "edge" cluster an ansible script was created. To execute it follow the steps below: Edit the hosts and main.yaml files replacing the fields between . You can find the information in the private evernote file. If you have no access request to Cristiano. Execute the command ansible-playbook -i hosts main.yaml
docs.title: Minikube Setup

docs.text: In order to setup minikube in our "edge" cluster an ansible script was created. To execute it follow the steps below: Edit the hosts and main.yaml files replacing the fields between . You can find the information in the private evernote file. If you have no access request to Cristiano. Execute the command ansible-playbook -i hosts main.yaml
docs.title: Minikube Setup

docs.text: Docker Layers folder consuming too much disk space If you see there is few disk space available may the root cause is that the docker layers folder is consuming two much space as described here . To understand if that is really the problem you can use the command du -h --max-depth=1. which shows how much disk space each folder is consuming. If that is the problem you may have to run command docker system prune -a that will prune and remove left overs. DNS not resolving If you are facing DNS issues try to follow the suggestion here .
docs.title: Troubleshooting

docs.text: If you see there is few disk space available may the root cause is that the docker layers folder is consuming two much space as described here . To understand if that is really the problem you can use the command du -h --max-depth=1. which shows how much disk space each folder is consuming. If that is the problem you may have to run command docker system prune -a that will prune and remove left overs.
docs.title: Layers folder consuming too much disk space
